title: tensor2metric
description:
Generate maps of tensor-derived parameters.



References:

Basser, P. J.; Mattiello, J. & Lebihan, D. MR diffusion tensor spectroscopy and imaging. Biophysical Journal, 1994, 66, 259-267

Westin, C. F.; Peled, S.; Gudbjartsson, H.; Kikinis, R. & Jolesz, F. A. Geometrical diffusion measures for MRI from tensor basis analysis. Proc Intl Soc Mag Reson Med, 1997, 5, 1742

adc.title: adc
adc.description: compute the mean apparent diffusion coefficient (ADC) of the diffusion tensor. (sometimes also referred to as the mean diffusivity (MD))

fa.title: fa
fa.description: compute the fractional anisotropy (FA) of the diffusion tensor.

ad.title: ad
ad.description: compute the axial diffusivity (AD) of the diffusion tensor. (equivalent to the principal eigenvalue)

rd.title: rd
rd.description: compute the radial diffusivity (RD) of the diffusion tensor. (equivalent to the mean of the two non-principal eigenvalues)

cl.title: cl
cl.description: compute the linearity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

cp.title: cp
cp.description: compute the planarity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

cs.title: cs
cs.description: compute the sphericity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

value.title: value
value.description: compute the selected eigenvalue(s) of the diffusion tensor.

vector.title: vector
vector.description: compute the selected eigenvector(s) of the diffusion tensor.

num.title: num
num.description: specify the desired eigenvalue/eigenvector(s). Note that several eigenvalues can be specified as a number sequence. For example, '1,3' specifies the principal (1) and minor (3) eigenvalues/eigenvectors (default = 1).

modulate.title: modulate
modulate.description: specify how to modulate the magnitude of the eigenvectors. Valid choices are: none, FA, eigval (default = FA).

mask.title: mask
mask.description: only perform computation within the specified binary brain mask image.

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.
